item.title: CVE-2024-20067|2024-06-03T02:04:45.365Z -- mediatek%2C%20inc. -- mt6813%2C%20mt6815%2C%20mt6835%2C%20mt6878%2C%20mt6897%2C%20mt6899%2C%20mt6986%2C%20mt6986d%2C%20mt6991%2C%20mt8792
item.description: In modem, there is a possible out of bounds write due to improper input invalidation. This could lead to remote denial of service with no additional execution privileges needed. User interaction is not needed for exploitation. Patch ID: MOLY01267285; Issue ID: MSV-1462.
